description:
Unfortunately, there is no species known as "Bombiscardovia apis" in the scientific literature. This appears to be a made-up or non-existent species name.

In general, when providing a scientific description of a species, the following key information is typically included:

1. Taxonomic classification (kingdom, phylum, class, order, family, genus, species)
2. Physical characteristics (size, shape, color, distinguishing features, etc.)
3. Habitat and geographic distribution
4. Ecological role and behaviors
5. Evolutionary relationships and phylogenetic positioning

Without a valid scientific name, it is not possible to provide an accurate, detailed description of the characteristics and biology of this particular species. If you have information about a real organism, please provide the correct scientific name, and I can attempt to give a more meaningful scientific description.
prompt: Provide a short scientific description of this species: Bombiscardovia apis
